converse.line: 'ho arr ya? Get out 'fore I stabs ya!
You're quite the fiesty little one.
ARRGH! Not 'notha Cabagesaur! I got nearla 20 'lready.
You're a fan of Gokuman cards? I used to collect them too.
Ya don't know nothin' 'bout dem. I'm da Gokuman master. I know everythin' 'bout dem. Got dem all 'cept one. I spent all me cash on buying cards I 'lready own.
U wot m8? 1v1 me! I'll stabs ya!
Woah! Okay. (I guess he's touchy on the subject.)
Ya says ya had cards? D'ya had a Holofoil Rare Grillidragon?
No, I don't recall having that one.
Dat's shame. I've some good cards tah trade for it.

choice.line: Lame. I 'lready has. Ya wastin' me time!
Well, I guess I could trade my Flipachu.
I has plentys of dem. Ya're a orrible trader! Get outa here 'fore I stabs ya!
No ways! Trade me now 'fore I stabs ya! I'll give ya anythin' ya wants for it!
I have two of da Alejandro's Kew. I guess ya can have it. Let me get it.
It's alright. You can have it.
Ya got somethin' wrong wid ya head. But if ya offerin'... I'll be takin'!

random.line: Yea! Me collection is complete. Now I'm da greatest kid on da block!
Lady! Ya card is gettin' me alls the attention from me mates. I'm very happy!
